titles.title: Federal District Court of American Samoa Act of 2006
To establish a Federal District Court of American Samoa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 2/8/2006--Introduced. Federal District Court of American Samoa Act of 2006 - Establishes for and within American Samoa a court of record to be known as the Federal District Court of American Samoa. Sets forth provisions respecting: (1) jurisdiction; (2) appointment of a judge, U.S. Attorney, and U.S. Marshal; and (3) rules of practice and procedure.
